item.title: Pothole, 21st February

The pothole has been there for around 3 months and no repairs have been carried out.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eltham Green Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights, 21st February
item.description:
I apologise if this is not the right platform to report this, but whoever designed the timing of the traffic lights at the New Eltham junction should review it again, because there is clearly something wrong. The 2–3 second green lights are causing massive traffic on Avery Hill Road, even when there is no traffic at all, not even three cars, on Foot Cray Road. Please could you direct me to the right place to report this, if this is not the correct platform?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Footscray Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Young tree needs securing, 21st February
item.description:
The young tree recently planted outside St Paul’s Villas, Park Road is moving and swaying too much even with no breeze. It needs more support otherwise the roots may break. It also appears that the adjacent young tree planted at the same time may have sadly died. I just noticed when I looked out my window this morning how much it was moving and swaying over to the side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
